{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15957v1", "title": "Kato-Milne cohomology group over rational function fields in
  characteristic 2, II", "summary": "Our aim in this paper is to prove in the setting of Kato-Milne cohomology in
characteristic 2 an exact sequence which is analogue to the Milnor-Scharlau
sequence [8, Theorem 6.2]. This is an extension of the Milnor exact sequence
proved in [6].", "main_category": "math.AC", "categories": "math.AC", "published": "2025-04-22T14:55:04Z"}
